43e139ec-1c7b-42ef-80ad-0afda3223219.title: Future Builder
43e139ec-1c7b-42ef-80ad-0afda3223219.subtitle: The Maker (MBTI: ISTP)
43e139ec-1c7b-42ef-80ad-0afda3223219.description: Hands-on creator who loves solving problems and turning ideas into real things. You mix science, math, and creativity to design smarter systems for the world.
43e139ec-1c7b-42ef-80ad-0afda3223219.tryThis: Design a mini prototype (robot, bridge, or housing system) using CAD tools or LEGO and showcase it at a fair.

4b01afba-8864-4240-86ab-c744dcf43f38.title: Future Analyst
4b01afba-8864-4240-86ab-c744dcf43f38.subtitle: The Decoder
4b01afba-8864-4240-86ab-c744dcf43f38.description: Pattern-spotter and puzzle-solver who enjoys working with data, logic, and strategy. You ask, "What's the smartest way to solve this?"
4b01afba-8864-4240-86ab-c744dcf43f38.tryThis: Build a sports or finance prediction model in Excel or Tableau.

941534b9-78d1-43b9-930a-719de3f2db39.title: Future Leader
941534b9-78d1-43b9-930a-719de3f2db39.subtitle: The Guide
941534b9-78d1-43b9-930a-719de3f2db39.description: Organizer and motivator who enjoys leading teams, planning projects, and inspiring people to achieve shared goals.
941534b9-78d1-43b9-930a-719de3f2db39.tryThis: Run a school initiative or community project — assign roles, track outcomes, and present results.

6b2c3f06-e755-4859-92c2-d8d2ff1eee33.title: Future Communicator
6b2c3f06-e755-4859-92c2-d8d2ff1eee33.subtitle: The Voice
6b2c3f06-e755-4859-92c2-d8d2ff1eee33.description: Storyteller and connector who loves expressing ideas, persuading others, and creating meaningful content that inspires action.
6b2c3f06-e755-4859-92c2-d8d2ff1eee33.tryThis: Start a blog, podcast, or YouTube channel on a topic you're passionate about.

e12ee9c2-8715-4ab8-bacd-112bb24f7b2a.title: Future Creator
e12ee9c2-8715-4ab8-bacd-112bb24f7b2a.subtitle: The Artist
e12ee9c2-8715-4ab8-bacd-112bb24f7b2a.description: Imaginative visionary who expresses ideas through art, design, and creative media. You see the world differently and bring beauty to everything.
e12ee9c2-8715-4ab8-bacd-112bb24f7b2a.tryThis: Create a portfolio showcasing your best creative work — art, designs, music, or videos.

1e21c155-e613-4ee8-842f-e9fc7a26c786.title: Future Explorer
1e21c155-e613-4ee8-842f-e9fc7a26c786.subtitle: The Discoverer
1e21c155-e613-4ee8-842f-e9fc7a26c786.description: Curious adventurer who loves learning, researching, and uncovering new knowledge. You ask 'why' and 'how' about everything.
1e21c155-e613-4ee8-842f-e9fc7a26c786.tryThis: Conduct a mini research project on a topic that fascinates you and present your findings.

f7055288-ef9a-4c77-9142-d8e2935020ac.title: Future Healer
f7055288-ef9a-4c77-9142-d8e2935020ac.subtitle: The Caregiver
f7055288-ef9a-4c77-9142-d8e2935020ac.description: Compassionate helper who wants to make people's lives better through health, wellness, and support. You care deeply about others' wellbeing.
f7055288-ef9a-4c77-9142-d8e2935020ac.tryThis: Volunteer at a local hospital, care home, or community health initiative.

fc0c680b-e587-4bc2-a206-ac626c2aeec1.title: Future Sustainability Champion
fc0c680b-e587-4bc2-a206-ac626c2aeec1.subtitle: The Guardian
fc0c680b-e587-4bc2-a206-ac626c2aeec1.description: Environmental advocate who wants to protect the planet and create sustainable solutions. You think about future generations.
fc0c680b-e587-4bc2-a206-ac626c2aeec1.tryThis: Start an eco-initiative at school or in your community — recycling, clean-up, or awareness campaign.

35631ac2-b9f3-4051-9242-dbe29c34c3c3.title: Future Enabler
35631ac2-b9f3-4051-9242-dbe29c34c3c3.subtitle: The Supporter
35631ac2-b9f3-4051-9242-dbe29c34c3c3.description: Behind-the-scenes champion who helps others succeed. You enjoy organizing, facilitating, and making systems work smoothly.
35631ac2-b9f3-4051-9242-dbe29c34c3c3.tryThis: Organize a school event or help coordinate a community project from start to finish.
